readable.title: 2074764331_90a9962b52
readable.content: A black and tan puppy is biting the ear of a brown dog . A black puppy chewing on a brown dog 's neck A black puppy chewing on an adult brown dog . A small puppy stands on his hind legs to bite a bigger dog who is lying on the stairs . The small brown dog is laying down while the black dog is biting it .
